summary: This is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York, forwarding a letter to Judge Nathan regarding discovery from other agencies in the Epstein case. The email includes attachments of legal documents.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: The recipient of a letter from government attorneys regarding discovery matters in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Government attorneys in the SDNY were corresponding about discovery matters in the Epstein case as of October 2021.
A letter was sent to Judge Nathan regarding obtaining discovery from other agencies.
The document shows ongoing legal proceedings related to the Epstein case years after his death.
